name: Obsidian Dream
description:
In Obsidian Dream, you play as a tiny crystal being, sneaking through a tomb to steal a mystical artifact known as the Almagem. Acquiring it won't be easy, as the tomb is guarded by a magical golem. 

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse - look around 

Credits:

Art: Sarah Rootsey, Cristian del Real, Asia Owens

Design: Alejandro Morales, Daniel Velasco

Programming: Alexander Delatour

Project Manager: Alexander Delatour
